name: Emir
title: Product Manager / Technical Lead
summary: Experienced product leader with technical background, specializing in scaling products, stakeholder management, and cross-functional team leadership. Proven track record in B2B and B2C SaaS.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
highlights: Led product roadmap for platform serving 100K+ users
Managed cross-functional team of 15 engineers and designers
Increased revenue by 40% through feature optimization
Implemented agile methodologies reducing time-to-market by 30%

experience.title: Technical Lead
highlights: Architected scalable systems handling 1M+ daily transactions
Led migration from monolith to microservices
Reduced infrastructure costs by 25% through optimization
